p:
However, another molecular dynamics simulation with data mining proposes that oxygen migration is constrained to the Co–O layers in PrBaCo 2O 5.5 with the barrier of 0.27 eV.
25 According to our results, a much higher migration barrier (1.20 eV) should be overcome for migration to the Co–O layers, and it seems that the discrepancy comes from the missing quantum mechanical description of a strong Co–O chemical bonding and dealing with high temperature up to 1573 K in ref ( 25).
